column4: Hey, I'm trying to use the desktop cube and it's not working.
I'm not sure what ccsm is.
I got my cube setup. Sweetness! Thank you kindly!
Do you know how to fix the screen resolution? The most I have is 1024x768.
which card? nvidia, ati, intel other?
which drivers are you using? the ones from repositories?
No. I'm using the restricted drivers. (And why is your name in red?)
to highlight so people can follow the responses more easily--have you tried setting the resolution via the gui?
I've tried that: System > Preferences > Screen Resolution. The max is 1024x768 and there aren't any other options for me to select.
I can give you another link--I am not so good with fixing resolution
